guidanceItem.title: Write access only on folders that support content authoring and are configured for authentication
guidanceItem.content:
Applies to

  • Web Application

What to Check For

Check to ensure that write permissions are configured only on folders that allow content authoring. Grant write access only to content authors. Also the folders that support content authoring should be configured to require authentication and SSL for encryption.

Adapted from Microsoft patterns & practices guidance.
